biotools.summary: Includes predicting DNA curvature; plotting physicochemical, statistical, or locally computed paramaters along DNA sequences; producing a 3-D model of a DNA sequence; searching an intron database.

bioschemas.name: DNAtools
bioschemas.summary: Includes predicting DNA curvature; plotting physicochemical, statistical, or locally computed paramaters along DNA sequences; producing a 3-D model of a DNA sequence; searching an intron database.
